discussion.content:
The given answer A and C won't do anything for the problem "Customers are assigned personal trainers who do not reside at the customer's location."

A: Customer Service Calendar: Defines when the training location is open for business.
B: resource skills : skilset of the trainers.
C: Work Hours : When is the trainer available
D: facility resources : Where does which trainer work.
E: Fullfillment Preferences : For setting up training blocks. For example setting up that every training will take 1 hour and 30 minutes.

I would choose C and D.

Selected Answer: CD
Definitely C and D. 
C=> solve issue with trainers work hours and D with the place where to train

It dependes on wheter the days are consecutive or not.

choices.D: one business closure record of a nine-day duration
